TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi sealed AxHost/AboutBoxDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

summary.span: 表示将显示 ActiveX 控件的“关于”对话框的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will display an ActiveX control's About dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 能够时 ActiveX 控件的有关框中将显示通知。The provides you the ability to be notified when the ActiveX control's About box is going to be displayed. 在显示关于框之前，将执行代码添加到委托方法。Code added to the delegate method is executed before the About box is displayed. 当你创建委托时，需要标识将处理 ActiveX 控件的有关对话框中的显示，如果有的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the display of an ActiveX control's About dialog box if it has one. 若要将方法与您的处理程序关联，添加到方法的委托的一个实例。To associate the method with your handler, add an instance of the delegate to the method. 除非移除了该委托，该处理程序会调用时调用该方法。The handler is called whenever the method is called, unless you remove the delegate. 有关委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例重写构造函数中，与和方法派生包装 Microsoft 掩码编辑 ActiveX 控件的类。The following example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此代码假定已通过运行 AxImp.exe MSMask32.ocx 文件上创建所生成的源代码`/source`开关来生成要编辑的包装类。This code assumes you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此代码将仅显示在 C# 语法中作为，它是唯一的语言输出通过 AxImp.exe。This code is only shown in C# syntax as that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]
